column1: Care of the Older Person - MSc
column5: Our flexible, value for money MSc geriatric medicine distance learning course offers healthcare professionals, from a range of settings, the opportunity to gain knowledge, skills and confidence in dealing with the complex health and social needs of the ageing population.This part-time master's degree in geriatrics provides high quality integrated and multidisciplinary education in the field of ageing, health and disease.Since the course is conducted entirely online following a distance learning format, we were able to selected top industry experts from across the globe to support and guide students throughout the course duration.
